siteDescription: Free interactive tools to help you optimize your sleep environment and improve sleep quality.

tools.name: Sleep Environment Optimizer
tools.description: Assess your bedroom environment and get personalized recommendations for better sleep quality.

tools.name: Shift Worker Sleep Planner
tools.description: Get a personalized sleep schedule optimized for your shift pattern, whether you work nights, rotating shifts, or irregular hours.

tools.name: Sleep Debt Calculator
tools.description: Track your weekly sleep patterns, calculate accumulated sleep debt, and get a personalized recovery plan.

tools.name: Bedtime Routine Builder
tools.description: Build a personalized wind-down routine based on your lifestyle, preferences, and sleep goals.

tools.name: Sleep Sound Finder
tools.description: Discover the perfect sleep sounds for your preferences - from white noise to nature sounds to ambient music.

tools.name: Natural Sleep Remedy Finder
tools.description: Find evidence-based natural remedies for your specific sleep challenges - from herbs to supplements to lifestyle changes.
